title: Dc in game for 2-3 seconds
body:
While playing in a game I would Dc for 2-3 seconds. This happens about 10-15 times in a 30 minute game. My ping is always under 50. I can't seem to find a way around this. I've turned off peer to peer, re-installed lol client, turning off firewall, and i can't think of anything else to do. This is the only dam game this problem occurs in. 

Please Help/advise. Thank you.

replies.body:
Hey there F1GHT4LIFE, 

You may wanna give Riot's connection KB a try and see if that fixes the issue. I would also suggest if that doesn't work to submit a ticket so that you can get some one on one help :) 

Connection KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues 

New Ticket: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Reach out to me if you need help, I'll be on for a bit. 

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
Ya i sent out a support ticket. They gave me the same link. It's much better happens less often. thank you
